Ingredients.3: 1 (14 ounce) can cream of coconut, shaken very well before opening

Ingredients.4: 1 (14 ounce) can coconut milk, shaken very well before opening

Ingredients.6: 0.5 cups rum (such as Bacardi®), or to taste

Directions.1: Add cinnamon to a large bottle or other container that can hold at least 8 cups using a funnel. Pour sweetened condensed milk, cream of coconut, coconut milk, evaporated milk, and rum through the funnel. Shake or stir well to combine.

Directions.2: Refrigerate coquito until chilled, at least 1 hour. Shake or stir before serving.
